summary: Following three lifelong friends who return to Moscow after military service, we see their aspirations juxtaposed against everyday life in 1960 Soviet Union.
cast: Valentin Popov|Nikolay Gubenko|Stanislav Lyubshin|Marianna Vertinskaya|Zinaida Zinoveva|Svetlana Starikova|Lev Prygunov|Tamara Bogdanova|Lyudmila Selyanskaya|Aleksandr Blinov|Lev Zolotukhin|Pyotr Shcherbakov|Gennadi Nekrasov|Nikolay Zakharchenko|Emma Adamovskaya|L. Ankudinov|V. Denisov|Pavel Finn|Dmitri Fyodorovsky|Olga Gobzeva|Andrey Konchalovskiy|Vladimir Krasnov|Andrey Ladynin|M. Lipeyko|Yevgeniy Maksimov|Andrey Mayorov|Rodion Nahapetov|Vladimir Peshkin|Yu. Pyankov|Lidiya Rasstrigina|Natalya Ryazantseva|Galina Shabanova|N. Sigal|Svetlana Svetlichnaya|Andrei Tarkovsky|T. Yakimenko|Bella Akhmadulina|Evgeniy Evtushenko|Rimma Kazakova|Bulat Okudzhava|Robert Rozhdestvensky|Gennady Shpalikov|Boris Slutsky|Tamara Sovchi|Mikhail Svetlov|Oleg Vidov|Andrei Voznesensky
title: Mne dvadtsat let
